text:
[Verse]
Feet on the ground splashing
Laughing underneath gray skies
Raindrops singing harmony
Joyful in the storm

[Verse 2]
Puddles form around me
Jumping high and feeling free
Nature’s rhythm guiding me
Dancing like a child

[Chorus]
Hands up twirling round
Heartbeats in the rain
Life feels so alive
Dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Clouds rolling above me
Thunder as my symphony
Lightning lights the stage for me
Nature’s spotlight beams

[Chorus]
Hands up twirling round
Heartbeats in the rain
Life feels so alive
Dancing in the rain

[Bridge]
Wet hair and soaked shoes
Don’t care what I lose
Smiles make the world new
Just me and the blue
title: Dancing in the Rain
